summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2445, for the improvement of 9th Avenue Northeast, from Ravenna Boulevard to East 65th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, providing for the necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 26244 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
